verses.kjv: And it came to pass, when men began to multiply on the face of the earth, and daughters were born unto them,
verses.ct: As the human population grew and spread across the earth, daughters were born to them.

verses.kjv: That the sons of God saw the daughters of men that they were fair; and they took them wives of all which they chose.
verses.ct: The sons of God noticed how beautiful these women were and married whichever ones they wanted.

verses.kjv: And the LORD said, My spirit shall not always strive with man, for that he also is flesh: yet his days shall be an hundred and twenty years.
verses.ct: Then the LORD said, "My Spirit will not put up with humans forever, for they are only mortal. From now on, they will live no more than 120 years."

verses.kjv: There were giants in the earth in those days; and also after that, when the sons of God came in unto the daughters of men, and they bare children to them, the same became mighty men which were of old, men of renown.
verses.ct: In those days, and even afterward, there were giants on the earth called the Nephilim. They were the children born from the sons of God and the daughters of humans, and they were famous and feared throughout the land.

verses.kjv: And God saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth, and that every imagination of the thoughts of his heart was only evil continually.
verses.ct: The LORD saw how deeply wicked humanity had become. Every thought and desire in the human heart was evil, all the time.

verses.kjv: And it repented the LORD that he had made man on the earth, and it grieved him at his heart.
verses.ct: The LORD was sorry he had ever made human beings. It broke his heart.

verses.kjv: And the LORD said, I will destroy man whom I have created from the face of the earth; both man, and beast, and the creeping thing, and the fowls of the air; for it repenteth me that I have made them.
verses.ct: So the LORD said, "I will wipe out every human being I have created from the face of the earth — along with the animals, the birds, and everything that crawls on the ground. I regret making all of it."

verses.kjv: But Noah found grace in the eyes of the LORD.
verses.ct: But Noah was different. The LORD was pleased with him.

verses.kjv: These are the generations of Noah: Noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and Noah walked with God.
verses.ct: This is the story of Noah and his family. Noah was a good and honest man, the most decent person of his time, and he walked closely with God.

verses.kjv: And Noah begat three sons, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.ct: Noah had three sons — Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

verses.kjv: The earth also was corrupt before God, and the earth was filled with violence.
verses.ct: God looked at the earth and saw how corrupt it had become. Violence was everywhere.

verses.kjv: And God looked upon the earth, and, behold, it was corrupt; for all flesh had corrupted his way upon the earth.
verses.ct: Every person on earth had turned away from what was right.

verses.kjv: And God said unto Noah, The end of all flesh is come before me; for the earth is filled with violence through them; and, behold, I will destroy them with the earth.
verses.ct: So God said to Noah, "I have decided to put an end to all people, because the earth is filled with their violence. I am going to destroy them along with the earth.

verses.kjv: Make thee an ark of gopher wood; rooms shalt thou make in the ark, and shalt pitch it within and without with pitch.
verses.ct: Build yourself a large boat from cypress wood. Make rooms inside it and seal it inside and out with tar.

verses.kjv: And this is the fashion which thou shalt make it of: The length of the ark shall be three hundred cubits, the breadth of it fifty cubits, and the height of it thirty cubits.
verses.ct: Build it 450 feet long, 75 feet wide, and 45 feet tall.

verses.kjv: A window shalt thou make to the ark, and in a cubit shalt thou finish it above; and the door of the ark shalt thou set in the side thereof; with lower, second, and third stories shalt thou make it.
verses.ct: Put a roof on it with an 18-inch opening along the top for air. Put a door in the side, and build three decks — lower, middle, and upper.

verses.kjv: And, behold, I, even I, do bring a flood of waters upon the earth, to destroy all flesh, wherein is the breath of life, from under heaven; and every thing that is in the earth shall die.
verses.ct: I am about to flood the earth with water and destroy every living thing under the sky that has breath in it. Everything on earth will die.

verses.kjv: But with thee will I establish my covenant; and thou shalt come into the ark, thou, and thy sons, and thy wife, and thy sons’ wives with thee.
verses.ct: But I am making a promise with you — you will enter the boat with your wife, your sons, and their wives.

verses.kjv: And of every living thing of all flesh, two of every sort shalt thou bring into the ark, to keep them alive with thee; they shall be male and female.
verses.ct: Bring two of every kind of living creature into the boat with you, one male and one female, to keep them alive.

verses.kjv: Of fowls after their kind, and of cattle after their kind, of every creeping thing of the earth after his kind, two of every sort shall come unto thee, to keep them alive.
verses.ct: Two of every kind of bird, animal, and crawling creature will come to you to be kept alive.

verses.kjv: And take thou unto thee of all food that is eaten, and thou shalt gather it to thee; and it shall be for food for thee, and for them.
verses.ct: Also bring along enough food for your family and all the animals."

verses.kjv: Thus did Noah; according to all that God commanded him, so did he.
verses.ct: Noah did everything exactly as God told him.
